title: Annual Sales Forecast
question_text:
The manager of a large supermarket chain would like to forecast annual sales for his stores based on selling space.
The Square Footage ($x$) and the Annual Sales ($y$) are as follows:
[question-stem] Find,
a.) the predicted annual sales for a store with $4{,}000$ square feet of selling space and
b.) the coefficient of correlation for this data[/question-stem]
solution:
To find the solution using a graphing calculator, put square footage ($x$) into L1 and annual sales ($y$) into L2. Then enter STAT CALC LinReg $(a+bx)$ L1, L2, Y1.
